title: 3 Bedroom, 1 Bath in Polish Triangle
posting_body: ['A 3 bedroom apartment at one of the most desirable locations in Dorchester.', 'Located a 5 minute walk to JFK on the Red line or 8 minute walk to Andrew Station.', 'This 3 bedroom apartment with hardwood floors throughout is in great condition and features a kitchen with granite and stainless steel appliances, recessed lights, washer/dryer in unit and so much more....', 'For those of you tired of the parking situation in Southie, or Uber users, come on over as this unit offers a short commute to city.', 'Less than half a mile from Carson beach.', 'Available for move in September 1st.', 'No smoking.', "Pet's ok/with restrictions/$50 monthly fee for cats/$100 monthly fee for dogs.", "Listed with an agent, and one month's rent is to be included at lease signing for agent fee.", '3 bedrooms + 1 office', '1 Bathroom', 'Washer/Dryer in Unit', 'Desirable location-5 minute walk to JFK Station (Red Line), 8 Minute walk to Andrew Sq.', '20 Minutes to Downtown Boston', '10 Minute Walk to South Bay Shopping, Carson Beach etc...', 'If interested, send a quick bio with info about yourself (job/why moving/who will live with you).', 'Please include a contact tel.', 'number and your availability, so you can be called back for a showing.', 'Owner pays for water.', 'Renter Responsible for gas and electric.', '1st, last and agent fee due at signing.']
